incrementButtonClass.description: Style class of the increment button.

decrementButtonClass.description: Style class of the decrement button.

incrementButtonIcon.description: Style class of the increment button.

decrementButtonIcon.description: Style class of the decrement button.

locale.description: Locale to be used in formatting.
locale.description_zh: 要在格式设置中使用的区域设置。

localeMatcher.description:
The locale matching algorithm to use. Possible values are 'lookup' and 'best fit'; the default is 'best fit'.
See [Locale Negotation](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl#locale_negotiation) for details.
localeMatcher.description_zh:
要使用的区域设置匹配算法。可能的值为 'lookup' 和 'best fit';默认值为“最佳拟合”。
有关详细信息，请参阅 [Locale Negotation]（https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl#locale_negotiation）。

mode.description: Defines the behavior of the component.

prefix.description: Text to display before the value.
prefix.description_zh: 要在值之前显示的文本。

suffix.description: Text to display after the value.

currency.description:
The currency to use in currency formatting. Possible values are the [ISO 4217 currency codes](https://www.six-group.com/en/products-services/financial-information/data-standards.html#scrollTo=maintenance-agency), such as 'USD' for the US dollar, 'EUR' for the euro, or 'CNY' for the Chinese RMB.
There is no default value; if the style is 'currency', the currency property must be provided.
currency.description_zh:
要在货币格式中使用的货币。可能的值为 [ISO 4217 货币代码]（https://www.six-group.com/en/products-services/financial-information/data-standards.html#scrollTo=maintenance-agency），例如“USD”表示美元，“EUR”表示欧元，“CNY”表示人民币。
没有默认值;如果样式为“Currency”，则必须提供 Currency 属性。

currencyDisplay.description: How to display the currency in currency formatting. Possible values are 'symbol' to use a localized currency symbol such as €, 'code' to use the ISO currency code, 'name' to use a localized currency name such as 'dollar'.
currencyDisplay.description_zh: 如何以货币格式显示货币。可能的值为“symbol”（使用本地化货币符号，如 €）、“code”（使用 ISO 货币代码）、“name”（使用本地化货币名称（如“dollar”）。

useGrouping.description: Whether to use grouping separators, such as thousands separators or thousand/lakh/crore separators.
useGrouping.description_zh: 是否使用分组分隔符，例如千分隔符或千万分隔符。

minFractionDigits.description:
The minimum number of fraction digits to use. Possible values are from 0 to 20; the default for plain number and percent formatting is 0;
the default for currency formatting is the number of minor unit digits provided by the [ISO 4217 currency code](https://www.six-group.com/en/products-services/financial-information/data-standards.html#scrollTo=maintenance-agency) list (2 if the list doesn't provide that information).
minFractionDigits.description_zh:
要使用的最小小数位数。可能的值为 0 到 20;纯数字和百分比格式的默认值为 0;
货币格式的默认值是 [ISO 4217 货币代码]（https://www.six-group.com/en/products-services/financial-information/data-standards.html#scrollTo=maintenance-agency） 列表提供的次要单位位数（如果列表未提供该信息，则为 2）。

maxFractionDigits.description:
The maximum number of fraction digits to use. Possible values are from 0 to 20; the default for plain number formatting is the larger of minimumFractionDigits and 3;
the default for currency formatting is the larger of minimumFractionDigits and the number of minor unit digits provided by the [ISO 4217 currency code](https://www.six-group.com/en/products-services/financial-information/data-standards.html#scrollTo=maintenance-agency) list (2 if the list doesn't provide that information).
maxFractionDigits.description_zh:
要使用的最大小数位数。可能的值为 0 到 20;纯数字格式的默认值是 minimumFractionDigits 和 3 中的较大值;
货币格式的默认值是 [ISO 4217 货币代码]（https://www.six-group.com/en/products-services/financial-information/data-standards.html#scrollTo=maintenance-agency） 列表（如果列表未提供该信息，则为 2）提供的 minimumFractionDigits 和次要单位位数中的较大者。

step.description: Step factor to increment/decrement the value.
step.description_zh: 递增/递减值的步长因子。

allowEmpty.description: Determines whether the input field is empty.
allowEmpty.description_zh: 确定输入字段是否为空。

disabled.description: When present, it specifies that the component should be disabled.
disabled.description_zh: 如果存在，则指定应禁用该组件。

readonly.description: When present, it specifies that an input field is read-only.
readonly.description_zh: 如果存在，则指定输入字段是只读的。

inputId.description: Identifier of the focus input to match a label defined for the chips.
inputId.description_zh: 焦点输入的标识符，用于匹配为芯片定义的标签。

inputClass.description: Style class of the input field.

inputStyle.description: Inline style of the input field.

inputProps.description: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLInputElement to the focusable input element inside the component.
inputProps.description_zh: 用于将 HTMLInputElement 的所有属性传递给组件内的可聚焦输入元素。

incrementButtonProps.description: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to increment button inside the component.
incrementButtonProps.description_zh: 用于将 HTMLButtonElement 的所有属性传递给组件内部的增量按钮。

decrementButtonProps.description: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to decrement button inside the component.
decrementButtonProps.description_zh: 用于将 HTMLButtonElement 的所有属性传递给组件内的递减按钮。

aria-labelledby.description: Establishes relationships between the component and label(s) where its value should be one or more element IDs.
aria-labelledby.description_zh: 在组件和标签之间建立关系，其中其值应为一个或多个元素 ID。

aria-label.description: Establishes a string value that labels the component.
aria-label.description_zh: 建立标记组件的字符串值。

pt.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.
pt.description_zh: 用于将属性传递给组件内部的 DOM 元素。

ptOptions.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.
ptOptions.description_zh: 用于配置组件的直通 （pt） 选项。

unstyled.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
unstyled.description_zh: 启用后，它会删除核心中与组件相关的样式。

events.name: input
events.description: Callback to invoke when the value is entered.

events.name: focus
events.description: Callback to invoke on focus of input field.
events.description_zh: 在输入字段的焦点上调用的回调。

events.name: blur
events.description: Callback to invoke on blur of input field.
events.description_zh: 在输入字段模糊时调用的回调。
